plot: The fortunes of a Broadway costume company rise and fall depending on who is running it, and whether its clients' shows succeed or not.
title: Manhattan Parade
plot_es: The fortunes of a Broadway costume company rise and fall depending on who is running it, and whether its clients' shows succeed or not.
plot_en: The fortunes of a Broadway costume company rise and fall depending on who is running it, and whether its clients' shows succeed or not.
